author: Mike Moore
description: AI won’t completely replace humans, and might even make us better overall, Michael Dell tells TechRadar Pro.
title: Dell CEO tells us how AI can make us “more effective as a species” - “there are a lot of things we don’t do, that we used to do, because we now have the tools”

description: Samsung is confident that the battery life in the Galaxy S25 Edge won't feel like a compromise.

description: Google finally shows off what its Android XR glasses and headset are capable of, and it's a mixed bag for now.
